Links

    Momentum Mod

    Momentum Mod is a free, open-source game that aims to centralize and improve upon existing source speedrunning game modes, such as surf, tricksurf, bunny hop (bhop), and climb (kz) from Counter Strike and rocket jump and sticky jump from Team Fortress 2. The full list of supported gamemodes is much larger, with gamemodes stemming from Titanfall 2 and Half Life 2 speedrunning communities, as well as quake defrag and Team Fortress conc jump.

    This is a passion project being developed by a medium-sized, international team. I contribute game code as well as keep documentation up to date. You can see my contributions here and here.


    μPsyc

    μPsyc is a system I developed during graduate school. It generates music compositions automonously via genetic algorithm. See my research page to listen to some of these generated compositions and view my publications of it.


    Other

    I have many other small projects made during the undergraduate and graduate school. These include:

    • Multiagent Composition - A multiagent system for generating music.
    • Rubik's Cube AI Project - A system made for solving Rubik's cubes of n dimensions.
    • Portfolio Website - The website you are viewing this on :)
